lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: I question Anne O'Hare McCormick's statement that Middle Western isolationists are keenly aware of our stakes in this war. Look at the Ohio vote on the amendments to the Neutrality Law. I am an interventionist. I have talked with dozens of isolationists in Columbus.
abstract: Isolationism: lrs on A O McCormick's Nov article on Middle West attitude
snippet: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: I question Anne O'Hare McCormick's statement that Middle Western isolationists are keenly aware of our stakes in this war. Look at the Ohio vote on the amendments to the Neutrality Law. I am an interventionist....
